title: Wyatt Cenac | Late Night Chats: Amanda Cowper & Michael Wightman
description:
Wyatt Cenac talks about traveling around the country for Wyatt Cenac's Problem Areas, rails against Delta SkyMiles and talks about playing a superhero on aka Wyatt Cenac.

He then talks to Late Night producer Henry Melcher exclusively for this podcast.

After that, hear a new edition of Late Night Chats, featuring staffers Amanda Cowper and Michael Wightman.


LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
